thread.title: Danielle Lloyd hits back at Jamie O'Hara after he claimed she's REFUSING to let him see their children
thread.title_full: Danielle Lloyd hits back at Jamie O'Hara after he claimed she's REFUSING to let him see their children

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: Danielle Lloyd hits back at Jamie O'Hara after he claimed she's REFUSING to let him see their children
text:
Danielle Lloyd hits back at Jamie O'Hara after he claimed she's REFUSING to let him see their children The Celebrity Big Brother star has been stopped from seeing his three boys after keys mishap Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Danielle Lloyd has hit back at her ex-husband Jamie O'Hara after he claimed she's stopped him from seeing his children. 
The former couple have three sons together: Archie, six, Harry, five, and George, three, but Jamie said he wasn't allowed to see them after losing his keys. 
However, Danielle released a statement on Loose Women today. 
She said: "As a single mother, my children are the main priority and I'm concerned about Jamie's ability to be a father." 
And Jamie defended himself, replying: "I'm concerned about the children, and they're my main priority." 
The war started when Jamie was at a charity event on Tuesday night for LGBT History Month, and accidentally left his bag and keys in the venue's cloakroom. 
"He thought someone else had grabbed them for him," a source told Mirror Online. "He was supposed to pick up his kids at 9am the next morning, but without his car keys, he couldn't. And the venue didn't reopen until later in the day." Jamie reportedly isn't allowed to see his children (Photo: Rex Features) Jamie tweeted this picture with his sons following his stint in the Celebrity Big Brother house (Photo: @Mrjamieohara1 /Twitter) Danielle wasn't happy that Jamie wasn't able to pick up their children (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
"So he emailed Danielle and explained the situation and said he'd be there as soon as he could. He even made plans for someone else to pick up the kids but Danielle refused. 
"She flew off the handle and said he wasn't allowed to see the kids. He's now going to have to go to court to fight to see his children. 
"He's absolutely heartbroken. He'd made plans for his time with the kids, had theme park tickets for them. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
